wf_workflow_version.name: Disaster Workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

Under the affected individuals table, make sure everyone is accounted for according to their status, if their status is unchanged reach out to them via their contact information. If marked as unsafe notify authorities and provide them their information. If nothing is selected after 30 minutes try to contact the individuals for their status.
Check each individual's status, if unsafe forward information to authorities
Check each individual's status, if unsafe forward information to authorities

Under the affected individuals table, make sure everyone is accounted for according to their status, if their status is unchanged reach out to them via their contact information. If marked as unsafe notify authorities and provide them their information. If nothing is selected after 30 minutes try to contact the individuals for their status.
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
Classify workplace emergency and add the affected location(s)
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
1 - Add Location fields to populate affected individuals 2 - Identify if evacuation is required then change field accordingly
Classify workplace emergency and add the affected location(s)
1 - Add Location fields to populate affected individuals 2 - Identify if evacuation is required then change field accordingly
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

wf_activity.name: Notify Authorites(If not already done) and Evacuate

sys_variable_value.value: If not already done, notify authorities immidiately. Also, evacuate the building.
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
If not already done, notify authorities immidiately. Also, evacuate the building.
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

activity.display_value: Notify Authorites(If not already done) and Evacuate

sys_variable_value.value: Review Emergency Guidlines & Add Affected Location(s)
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
Review appriate knowledge base materials for the emergency. If evacuation is required, select the evacuation required checkbox and make sure affected location is selected.
Review Emergency Guidlines & Add Affected Location(s)
